name: Trulux - LIPLEX 22
description: Trulux is a specialty cosmetic ingredients innovator offering LIPLEX 22, a patented lipid complex featuring noncomedogenic, botanically sourced lipids designed to deliver a skin surface lipid profile. Ideal for barrier repair, acne-prone skin, and sensitive skin formulations with patented biomimetic technology.
notes: Specialty cosmetic ingredients innovator with patented technology. LIPLEX 22 is a patented lipid complex featuring noncomedogenic, botanically sourced lipids designed to deliver skin surface lipid profile. Ideal for barrier repair in acne-prone and sensitive skin formulations where traditional lipids may cause comedogenicity. Patented formulation ensures unique positioning in premium barrier repair market.
